website_summaries.verdict: This corded phone is a great choice for customers who have vision and or hearing impairments.
pros: Very large numbers that are easy to see
equipped with receiver volume control switch
cons: You can only preprogram 2 numbers into the phone

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom who has difficulty seeing and hearing. All calls are very clear for her and she has no problems hearing it ring. And she can see the large buttons. The phone is kind of cute!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Madalena

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic phone for a senior with memory loss.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my 98 year old mom, based on other reviews. She was using an old cordless phone which was worn out and she kept losing the phone. She loves her new phone! It’s easy to use, handset doesn’t get lost and best of all, she can hear us. The large numbers are great. Mom has severe short term memory loss, so she won’t be dialing out. Someone with better memory could use them easily. We had to get a longer cord to plug the phone into the jack. I highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rav4gram

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this it is the FC-1507 but at a higher price
customer_reviews.text: I was buying my mother 2 amplified phones with big numbers. I wanted to buy different models to see if one worked better than the other. I bought this Home Intuition phone for $44.95 and an FC-1507 phone for $28.28 at the same time. I had them shipped to my mothers home and my brother installed them. I went out to her home today and i find both phones are identical and both labeled FC-1507. I knew they looked similar but I would have never guessed they were the same by reading the descriptions. Also my mother says she cant hear much better even with her hearing aids in.
customer_reviews.author: Porkmeister 26

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced junk--no dial tone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my elderly mother. Plugged it in, no dial tone. Maintenance director at her assisted living community took a look for me and said the problem was that a button on the phone was permanently smashed down and wouldn't release--i.e., he didn't see any way it would be fixable. To confirm his perception, he plugged in a different landline phone and it worked just fine. Am returning this phone and searching elsewhere. Maybe a replacement would work, but for this steep a price I expect quality control the first time out.
customer_reviews.author: college prof mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Aunt who has mac degeneration; and hard of hearing. BIG dial pads make it easy for her to see the numbers. Hi/Lo volume control makes it easy to hear she says. Only drawback is a 'mute' button in middle of handset; but she hasn't hit it yet--and did not tell her about it so not to confuse her about its operation.. Overall a good buy for the $$. Fast delivery, great retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Cabanabob

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough that my Mom can hear the ring and hears better on this unit than her previous phone.
customer_reviews.text: Like the loudness. Only bad point so far is the light weight. It is easily knocked off the top of the bedside table. I have had to put it in the top drawer of the table to protect it from falling off. Large buttons are easily seen and punched.
customer_reviews.author: Gail V. Clark

customer_reviews.title: finally a phone my mother in law can see
customer_reviews.text: Likes - numbers are big enough for near blind mother in law to see, simple, not too many features she doe not need. dislikes - a little too lightweight, almost have to glue to table to keep her from knocking it around. All in all it is the oe of the only phone I found that she can operate. She is very nearly blind and can still see the numbers. And there are no complicated features to confuse her. The 911 button should be bigger and not so close to the memory buttons. She called 911 by mistake.
customer_reviews.author: tgr

customer_reviews.title: Phone no longer works
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this phone for my mother in a nursing home. She heard us fine, but we had difficulty hearing her. Her room was moved several times, and we attributed the sound issues to the phone lines in the nursing home. We eventually brought it home to our house and the sound is as bad. The phone is defective and not useable. There is no way to determine if this is a unique fluke. Unfortunately it is now beyond Amazon's return policy and we are out $39.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Dialing issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my older brother (79) who is hard of hearing and has very poor vision. It is a great phone except that he gets very frstrated with it because if you don't dial at a fairly quick speed, a recording intercepts the call and says the call cannnot be completed. It is great for when we call him, but he has a lot of problems with calling out on it as he is somewhat slow. We do have the option of setting up speed dial, but that is confusing for him.
customer_reviews.author: CarolH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great, can hear both with the ringer and voices when talking.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Minton

customer_reviews.title: Nice - until a few weeks later...
customer_reviews.text: Update: from 3 stars down to 1...the 1, 4 and 7 buttons ALL have stopped working! Hasn’t even been a month!! Guess I’ll go check out the warranty. This phone is as close to perfect as we could get for our nearly 90 year old mother. We didn’t want ANY other buttons other than the numbers to dial, and this is as close as we found. It’s very easy to disconnect the 911 auto-dial feature, it’s nice and loud with volume turned up, and she loves the large buttons. Already had a nice long cord, so she can walk around the kitchen while on the phone. Hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morando

customer_reviews.title: On a Phone for  Hearing-disabled, Where's the Volume Control?
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very attractive on my desk, and has good tone qualities, but where is the volume control? Since it was included in the sections on telephones for the hard-of-hearing, I expected to be able to raise the volume when needed, more than the "Low-High" that is built in. Proves that old adage: buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Light weight plastic, hopefully it won’t get dropped, I’m sure it would brake. Short phone cord, you have to hold on your lap to use receiver and plan on buying an extra cord to plug into wall or computer that one is too short too. The ringer is extremely loud even on low, but if you place a towel under the phone that will buffer the ring. The buttons are huge, but this was purchased for an elderly person so will wait to see if this works out. It would be better if the key pad was lit but it works and the red flashing light when there is an incoming call is a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: TMT & Family

customer_reviews.title: What a Joke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 92 year old Mom but was so disappointed with the product and shipping package that it will be returned ASAP . The phone came in a plastic bag with the box open and the parts all over the bag. When I looked at it the product is just terrible. It weighs almost nothing so answering the phone will automatically pull it off the table. The coil cord is too short and of poor quality, and the line in cord looks like something from a $.99 store. Avoid!!!!
customer_reviews.author: William H

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Poorest design phone. There is a mute button in the handle. My mother with dementia seems to always press this when talking and then is saying I can't hear you. I returned the item as it is of such poor design that it does not work for someone with mental impairment.
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: Happy mother-in-law.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this phone for my mother-in-law who has macular degeneration, and is legally blind. She is in an assisted living complex and the telephone is her means of staying connected to the outside world. She has very limited vision, and the large numbers are visible enough she can see them to dial out. She is very pleased with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grandma
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for grandma. She couldn't find the tiny buttons on most regular phones that have way too many buttons anyways. She has 8 kids so I set each number button to dial their phone. 1 = oldest kid to 8 being the youngest. Now all she has to do is push one button and it dials for her. The only down side is with this setting, she can't manually dial a phone number but, as long as she can contact one of my aunts or uncles, they will be able to help her. I did leave the 9-1-1 button programed so she also has that for an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone📞
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves her phone🤣🤣🤣 I call her today from work and she was laughing about how loud the phone rings she's talking about you acting like I'm going deaf 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣 the phone is loud and it's clear my sister was looking for a phone she said why didn't I think about going to Amazon I told her because I'm the coolest she said OH HUSH!!!!!!!!🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣
customer_reviews.author: MR RON

customer_reviews.title: Great for Seeing/Hearing/Feeling Impairments
customer_reviews.text: My mother has limited sight, some hearing loss and neuropathy in her hands and fingers. This made the use of a cell phone incredibly difficult for her. This phone is incredibly simple in design and features, and was literally plug-n-play. Setting up memory dial is also very easy. Perfect phone for my mother’s needs.
customer_reviews.author: Humans of Kork & Kopper

customer_reviews.title: Quieter, not louder
customer_reviews.text: My husband needs just a few, large, buttons and he's hard of hearing so we ordered this. Easy to program, great sized buttons and not too many of them. Sounds perfect except: It's QUIETER than a regular phone! On both ends - it's HARDER for him to hear than a typical phone and it's also HARDER for the caller to hear him! Why ever would anyone create a 'senior phone' that's quieter????????????? Am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t call out!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 96yo Mother-in-law who has cataracts but no one will operate! She lives for her phone calls to friends... We couldn’t call out for her.... Mute button on handle was weird so had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Diane G. Cestra

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Mother
customer_reviews.text: My 93 mom likes it very much. She said it's small but the buttons are big and its loud enough for her to hear it.
customer_reviews.author: My Name is Irrelevant

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. I’m a caregiver for a 96 yr old Vetran....and he loves it. So easy to see the numbers to dial. Just wish it had a speaker button so he could hear his message when I retrieve them for him. He wants another one that I’m ordering today!
customer_reviews.author: rita avasso

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother is legally blind, the keypad button are great , large with good contrast. There is something that would make this phone a lot better that I’ve not seen and I’ve looked. You offer memory dialing , but my mother can’t see the tiny memory button that you have to push to engage feature. There is space there. If you made it the same size as the number keys it would be more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great phone - big buttons - good value
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law has advanced macular degeneration and cannot see the buttons on a regular phone. This phone has been great for her. She loves the easy to see buttons and the extra loud ringer. I highly recommend this phone to anyone who has vision or hearing issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pharmacy Technician

customer_reviews.title: Loves the phone!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the phone for my Mother-in-law who is 96 years old and legally blind. She also is hard of hearing and wears hearing aids. The numbers are large enough where she can make them out and she can now dial the phone. The loud ringer is a plus also. She Loves the new phone! She said that Christmas came early this year.
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the visually impaired
customer_reviews.text: We bought this phone for my sister-in-law who has recently been diagnosed with low vision. This phone with its large buttons, easy access to a couple of most used phone numbers, and 911 button is perfect for her. Her hearing is also an issue so the volume control on the phone is great for her. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read - good volume
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone for my mom. She is 88. The volume is very good and the number size is perfect. She has macular degeneration and can see the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Great for Seniors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 91 year old Mother, who suffers from macular degeneration. She has found it much easier to use the telephone with this one. The buttons are large, and very helpful, and the amplified handset works well for her also. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: 4-Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Where is the volume?
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are large and easy to read. The volume was very disappointing. I have found this to be the issue for several phones that were allegedly amplified phones. This was for my friend, and he told me to try it, and I had trouble hearing! That is why I buy Free Return items!
customer_reviews.author: CS2nd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elderly
customer_reviews.text: My father-in-law is so hard of hearing but refuses to use hearing aids. He wasn’t able to hear his phone ring and if he called us, he was screaming at us! This phone is perfect. He can hear it ring and now uses a normal voice to talk with us. Thank you! Bonus is that the numbers are so big, it’s easy for him to dial. Highly recommend for elderly folks you love and want to chat with. The aid in the assisted living facility set it up in two shakes so must have been easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: big buttons and loud ring
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a amazing.. bought it for my mom who's sight isn't the best..but this phone is perfect..she was so happy with it..I gave it to her Early..it was supposed to be for Christmas but her cordless phone buttons were too small even lit up ..this phone is the best on the market.. totally recommend this phone..loud ring big numbers...thank you for making a great product for people that have limited vision and hearing
customer_reviews.author: barbara nixdorf

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone for Mother
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone for my mother who is losing sight due to macular degeneration, her hearing is getting worse and has moderate dementia. The number keys are large enough for her to see. I was able to program three numbers with the very top buttons which is the number she needs. The ringer could be louder but is fine when she's sitting in her chair by the phone, which is most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dad Can See the Numbers!
customer_reviews.text: My 97 year-old father loves this phone. He has severe macular degeneration, but can see the numbers on the buttons. We programmed our numbers in it so that he can call us using single buttons, but he has also called us using the entire phone number. We all feel an added sense of security that the 911 button is separate and red. This phone has made him very happy, because it has enhanced his feeling of independence.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: That the numbers are huge, and the volume is loud.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome, my father is 83 yrs old, hard of hearing and has aged related macular degeneration, which means no central vision, he was able to read and hear the phone with little effort. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Draper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make calls for those with vision and memory issues
customer_reviews.text: Great for my father who has dementia and macular degeneration. All buttons on the phone can be programmed to dial a single number so he can always get a hold of me by pressing any button on the phone. No need to remember or dial a full telephone number. My dad loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Frozen button after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: The #3 button sticks after less than 6 weeks. Someone in their 20s or 30s could work around it, but it is game over for my elderly mother. Totally worthless. Amazon says it is outside of the return window, so I might as well have burned $50.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use by elderly people
customer_reviews.text: loved the large size of the number buttons for my client who is vision issues. I also stored the phone number of her husband who is in the nursing home so she can call him with the push of a button. Liked so much I ordered one for so both husband and wife can have one.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Wall Hanger?
customer_reviews.text: the mounting extrusions on the back of the phone are too shallow for wall plates. I'm going to have to make something to mount it on. This is not good. Big numbers, though. I'll edit this once I get it mounted and let you know how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Bykergus

customer_reviews.title: Problems with low vision & dialing phones TOTALLY solved!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just about perfect for my 98 year old mother. We did have to get a volume enhancer from Amazon, because she wears hearing aids, but that fixed it right up. Even with very low vision, she can dial this phone herself!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C Ruth Bass

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for those with poor eyesight and hearing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my sister who has poor eyesight and hearing, so I haven't used the phone myself. But my sister likes the phone as she can see the buttons and can make calls, and can also hear the phone when it rings. So, has worked out well for her.
customer_reviews.author: RussH

customer_reviews.title: Great telephone
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought the phone for my brother who is 99 years old, has lost most of his eyesight, and is currently in an Assisted Living facility. He did not like the phone they provided for him but he loves the large numbers on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My mom is vision impaired and resides in an assisted living situation. She has been very frustrated attempting to make phone calls. i thought this would make a great mother's day gift. although i purchased it way in advance, it did not arrive until well after mothers day. what was most frustrating (and hard to comprehend) was that the delivery date kept changing. Now that it's finally arrived, it is all we hoped it would be. i understand that we live in unusual times but i wish they would have been honest about when it would arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Flawed
customer_reviews.text: Again the phone was working fine in the beginning... but as it turns out it’s flawed. We can’t make phone calls, the numbers programmed on the phone are programmed even without pressing the memory button. This is like the fifth phone ordered for my mother...
customer_reviews.author: Gisselle Baskerville

customer_reviews.title: can you hear me now?
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my 93 mother-inlaw who is vision and hearing impaired. I got her a longer handset cord and line cord which worked better for her. It would be nice if there were options as an add on instead of searching other places for those parts.
customer_reviews.author: DanB

customer_reviews.title: Bought for mother w dementia
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A phone without all the bells & whistles that only confuse my elderly mother. Like that it lights up when ringing & sounds when not properly hung up. Numbers also big for sight impaired.
customer_reviews.author: CathyM

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my elderly mother and she loves it. The large, easy to read numbers make it simple for her to use and the volume control is great since she's hard of hearing. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jdh

customer_reviews.title: Mom who is 97 loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Mom just loves it, she has hearing loss and sight loss and she finds the keys incredibly large and visible. She laughs at how large they are and happy with the clarity of the sound.
customer_reviews.author: H. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Future call phone-doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Was sent a Future call phone which was nothing but static. Wouldn’t have ordered had unknown it was a future call phone.
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For SENIORS
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome phone for my 80 yr old uncle who has lost sight in one of his eyes, and My mother who is in her early 70s, they both say, they enjoy the eye view of the numbers of the phone and the ringing volume is perfect to their ears.
customer_reviews.author: DAYNA MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Great for visually impaired brother
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my brother who has low vision, it is a great phone and he is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Denise

customer_reviews.title: This phone is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my mother who is visually and seeing impaired. the phone is compact yet has large numbers and a very loud ring we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: was a gift for my Stroke affected brother. He loves it!`
customer_reviews.author: Gary Thomas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My nearly blind sister
customer_reviews.text: My sister just loves the phone and is now able to call people and she feels much more secure that she doesn't need help to use the phone.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who has glaucoma and whose eyes are terrible. She can easily see the buttons and everything else on the phone is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Phone works well for my 98-year-old mother
customer_reviews.text: This phone, which does not require either batteries or a wall-cube, nevertheless produces loud enough sound for my mother, whose hearing is poor. I am quite satisfied with the phone. It is very helpful not to have to worry about batteries or an AC outlet connection.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph E. Dratman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Our elderly aunt absolutely loves being able to see the numbers and the handset is attached so she can't lose it!! A bonus for everyone!! =]
customer_reviews.author: TinaN

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the vision impaired
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my grandmother that cannot see very well. The numbers are big and it was easy to program the phone numbers she needed. All she has to do is push one button to make a phone call. So far the phone is working well and she is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo loud it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use for my elderly grandmother who has dementia. It’s also ear piercing loud so she can actually hear the phone ring! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Little Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Bid numbers!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the ringer cannot be turned off, and I wish it had caller ID. I love the big numbers as I have very low vision. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: more then Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am legally blind and this phone is by far the best home phone I, have had in many years. The phone is also made great, Best buy on this one. Joshua GK Baltimore MD
customer_reviews.author: GoldKlein & Bates MD

customer_reviews.title: Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the phone for my mom who's in a rehab center. She's coming home b/4 she got to use it so we'll be trying it there. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Larson

customer_reviews.title: It needs a blinking light when it ringing
customer_reviews.text: My parents are in their ninety and were having problems hearing the phone and for getting to put them on the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyteacup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone for Seniors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone for my mom who has diminished eyesight and some loss of hearing. She could no longer use a cell phone, and this tabletop phone fit the bill. She actually called me last night!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was a snap to install...just like phones in the old days. Plug it in and go. The volume is perfect and the large buttons are great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective
customer_reviews.text: For the money this phone is as good as it gets. I have a moderate hearing loss, and I was able to hear words clearly. I have yet to receive a call from a person with a light,high pitched voice.
customer_reviews.author: Village CC

customer_reviews.title: it will not help the hard of hearing
customer_reviews.text: sending it back. My elderly friend could not hear any better with this phone than with a standard one.
customer_reviews.author: wes_ben

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the visually impaired but beware of the mute button.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great except for the mute button on the hand set. We taped over it so that our elderly father would not inadvertently push it. Similar phones seem to have that same questionable feature.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M Ruberg

customer_reviews.title: Home Intuition phone makes calling easy again
customer_reviews.text: Ordered phone for my elderly Mom. She has limited vision & often cannot find phone or see numbers when making a call. Thanks to her new Home Intuition phone she can see numbers & make calls easily !
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rychtarik

customer_reviews.title: Phone works great and serves purpose. Price is too high
customer_reviews.text: This phone is perfect for the elderly person we bought it for- however i thought price was a little high and when i came back to amazon to order a second one for them I discovered you can get two for the cost of this one from other sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel rosier

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with large numbers
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone from Grandma and she loves it. The large numbers make it easy for her to see
customer_reviews.author: Nate C

customer_reviews.title: For my hearing impaired mother-in-law
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is that the earphone amplifier volume should be able to be turned up a little louder. Other then that she is enjoying the phone. She loves the large numbers and loud ringer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Amplified?  The ringer may be a bit louder than avg, that's it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this phone for a relative with hearing loss. I knew right away that it wouldn't provide amplified headset sound because it doesn't even have an external power supply. Yes it has volume control but it doesn't do much except introduce a buzzing sound into the headset. Looked cheaply made as well so we returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Winger

customer_reviews.title: Good For Earing And Coordination Challenged People
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 88 year old father. He has big hands/fingers and does not hear like he used to. He is very satisfied with it. He likes the big buttons and he can hear the ringer. It appears to be just as advertised and I am okay with the price as long as it makes my dad's life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Woodski

customer_reviews.title: The easy-to-see numbers.
customer_reviews.text: The easy-to-see numbers. Would have preferred if cords were included with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: David Y.S. Yee, D.P.M.

customer_reviews.title: Large Buttons Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for relative with macular degeneration. She is able to use without any problems. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Can be used by legally blind people
customer_reviews.text: My wife is legally blind but can make out the numbers on the phone. The first phone she has been able to use since being afflicted. For that reason alone the phone is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nebraska man

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Sounds awful
customer_reviews.text: Big numbers are great for visually impaired but so much ch static that you can’t use it. Called customer service line and was told to order a different model. Nothing they could do. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Disgusted!

customer_reviews.title: Really great phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly aunt who is visually impaired. The phone features a one touch dial for all of the buttons, so we were able to program several numbers in. Now she is able to call anyone we've added with a touch of one of the pre-programmed buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Juan O.

customer_reviews.title: Great sized numbers telephone
customer_reviews.text: I bought the telephone for my parents and it's perfect for them. Good number size, easy to install and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Given to my father as a Christmas present. They absolutely love it and are going to order some for other relatives.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Drosdak

customer_reviews.title: Large numbers
customer_reviews.text: Ease to use but the instructions were difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend with vision and hearing problems. It works great and they are able to now dial out and hear the conversation. Very easy to hook up. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Boeger

customer_reviews.title: Mom Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 91 year old vision impaired mother who is very tech adverse. She can dial it on her own and can hear clearly. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Woodbilly

customer_reviews.title: Happy Parent!
customer_reviews.text: My father is elderly and has almost lost his hearing and Eye sight isn’t as great. He specifically asked me for a phone with large numbers. I found this one and it’s perfect. He’s very happy with his new gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Strengths and Weaknesses of Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my 92 and 97 year old mother and stepfather. Their vision is impaired and so I liked the large buttons on the phone so they could see them better compaired to other phones. However, the buttons need to be pressed very hard or repeatedly when trying to make a call at times. It would help if the phone had a speaker for hands free conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Barnstable

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for my 90 year old mother. She can hear great on the phone and easy for her to see and use.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin L. Graves

customer_reviews.title: This phone is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: This phone has a loud ringer and the handset with volume amplifier is perfect. I still am having trouble storing numbers in the memory. The instructions could be more explanatory. I received this phone quickly, even a day before I thought it would arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Amplifier
customer_reviews.text: We returned it because my 97 year old mother could not hear the other person speaking, even with the amplifier. She is very hard of hearing and wears two hearing aids.
customer_reviews.author: Dodge City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: My 90 plus year old mother loves this phone, she can hear clearly. She was surprised how big the number are.
customer_reviews.author: danny d smith

customer_reviews.title: Numbers are very easy to see for those with vision problems
customer_reviews.text: Numbers are very easy to see, easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Teeters

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 95 year old Dad!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone for my 95 year old Dad. He likes it very much. So much easier for him to use. Would recommend this to any older person who has trouble seeing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for 98-yr-old aunt in nursing home...worked a few days, then stopped...she could find nobody to fix it...so, a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Joannagirl

customer_reviews.title: NO SPEAKER NO USE!
customer_reviews.text: A key feature of any senior phone is speaker phone capability. This one is not a smart deal.
customer_reviews.author: Product Guru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elderly!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my elderly father. He was always losing his cordless phone. Plus, he can see the numbers so much easier with this phone. We ended up buying another one for a different room in his house because we like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use for the purpose that it was purchased at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my wife due to her sight problems and she enjoys being able to see what she is using which is working out well for her. Suggest the volume control features could be easier to adjust and better accessible. I would still recommend it to anyone having sight problems.
customer_reviews.author: herbjohn

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars except for one item.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is excellent except for the listening volume with the switch on max. It was not as good as the volume on the standard phone it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ted Kreutzberg

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for elderly
customer_reviews.text: The phone was exactly as described and perfectly fit our needs.I recommend it to anyone who needs a simple phone with large buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Phone for the elderly....good....but volume could be louder for those who don’t hear well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 95 year old father who is hard of hearing and can’t see very well. Everything is great about the phone except the volume on the receiver. It could be louder so he can hear better. Maybe a phone with a louder receiver for the elderly would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H Hill

customer_reviews.title: Simple and solid.
customer_reviews.text: A godsend to install for a senior. Simple and readable. No bells and whistles to cause confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Hake

product_meta.title: Home Intuition Amplified Single Line Corded Desk Telephone with Large Easy to Read Buttons and Extra Loud Ringer
product_meta.description:
Introduction
The Home Intuition simple yet extremely useful Single Line Landline Corded Telephone with Extra Large Number Buttons and Hearing Aid Compatibility provides great convenience and functionality while great clarity, sound, and both unmissed and uninterrupted phone calls with and from your loved ones. 

Features
This telephone handset comes fully equipped with a receiver volume control switch which is compliant with FCC Part 68 requirements mandated by the Hearing Aid Compatibility Act of 1988. The volume control which is a small switch found on the inside of the handset is ready to use right out of the box and gives you full control of the ringer volume so you can make sure it’s set to your comfort and lifestyle needs.

Product Satisfaction
Our combination of high grade material and low cost help deliver a product that's long lasting and dollar friendly. With our 5 YEAR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE you can shop at ease knowing that well have your back unlike most of the manufacturers out there, so what are you waiting for? Pick yours up today.

What’s In The Box?

* 1 Handset
* 1 Base unit with classic dial pad
* 1 9 Foot Cord
* 1 Wall Mout
* 1 Instruction Manual
feature_bullets: SIMPLE CLASSIC DESIGN. The neutral yet classic phone design compliments almost any room delivering that unforgettable corded landline phone design we had growing up with Large Easy to See Number Buttons

HEARING IMPAIRED APPROVED. This telephone handset comes fully equipped with a receiver volume control switch which complies with FCC Part 68 requirements mandated by the Hearing Aid Compatibility Act of 1988. The volume control is a small switch found on the inside of the handset ready to use right out of the box
NO MORE MISSED CALLS. These phones have a bell ringer. The volume control switch is located on the bottom of the phone and switches between high and low volume

WIDE RANGE OF MOVEMENT. We provide you with a 9 foot chord to make sure you still have the proper range and maneuverability your looking for while on the phone and getting things done without having to put your loved ones on hold each and every time

5 YEAR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. You have nothing to worry about because we have got you covered. Our money back guarantee provides you with the comfort you deserve to make sure your money was well spent and the best part is if your not satisfied we'll return your money. This is the type of service which is unheard of and what you wont see from any of the overpriced manufacture's

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars346 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
